title: cultural_data_Immersive_Art_Experience
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.culturespaces.immersiveart.
Application Name: Immersive Art Experience.
Number of Reviews: 34.00.
Application Description: The application « Masterpieces on focus » offers you to discover in a fun way and playful manner the masterpieces of immersive exhibitions of our 3 digital art centers through original anecdotes on 30 major works from each exhibition.« Monet, Renoir… Chagall. Journeys around the Mediterranean » at Atelier des Lumières in Paris (28 February 2020 to 3 January 2021). From Monet’s Water Lilies to Chagall's Noah’s Ark via Renoir’s Bal au Moulin de la Galette, learn more about masterpieces of this itinerant journey, from Impressionism to Modernism.« Dalí, the endless enigma » at Carrières de Lumières in Baux-de-Provence (6 March 2020 to 3 January 2021). From The Discovery of America by Christopher Columbus to The Persistence of Memory via The Temptation of St. Anthony, discover the artist’s amazing and highly imaginative works. « Gustav Klimt, gold and colour » at Bassins de Lumières in Bordeaux (17 April 2020 to 3 January 2021). From Judith I to The Virgin via the famous work The Kiss, find the major works of this journey covering a century of Viennese painting.Exhibitions produced by Gianfranco Iannuzzi, Renato Gatto, and Massimiliano Siccardi, with the musical collaboration of Luca LongobardiRead moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 1225.00.
Overall Rate: 2.20.
First Page Reviews: I enjoy the artwork, but the Playlists won't load. Why have a playlist, and an app for an immersive experience, and then not actually play the music? Bizarre app Nothing loads up hoping it's a glitch you can sort out soon. Click on an exhibition and all I get are blank squares. The app does not work.Stops all the time..
Number of Characters in First Page Reviews: 320.00.
